post.body: sometimes we don't know the difference either http://tinyurl.com/5ca3jd
fb: Christian does not like cold feet.
fb: Christian is changing plans around two vomiting children. Poor girls.
fb: Christian is excited for deep sea fishing off the Maui coast!
fb: Christian is full of home made pizza.
fb: Christian is drinking Fat Squirrel.
Voted.
Is in the voting line.
fb: Christian just heard today counts as the 2,000th day since "Mission Accomplished" in Iraq, and hopes people think hard about wh..
fb: Christian really should know by now how to *not* chew on the inside of his mouth while eating.
fb: Christian is alternating between the Brewers and Badgers games. Wooo Wisconsin sports!
fb: Christian has a hard time turning late-afternoon-productive-mode brain into evening-family-mode brain...
is a first-time uncle as of 9:00AM and can't wait to meet the little guy!
15mo old Stella points out round objects as 'bah' (ball). She just showed me the bah in the sky (moon).
~14mo old Stella learned to nod her head yes today. she now knows to nod "yes" and "no", the word "ball", and the sign for "more".
reading the django 1.0 release notes: http://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/releases/1.0/ woot!
Hannah's officially a first grader. Wasn't just yesterday her first day of kindergarten?
Ben n jerrys after childrens museum. Capitol visit next.
Drinking games at the duck blind
Reading discharge instructions... Comic Sans throughout
fb: Christian is re-reading the HTML 5 canvas spec and watching Pink Floyd: Pulse on PBS.
fb: Christian hopes the girls feel better.
New google reader theme is a slight improvement. Google, now can you fix items returning after I've already read them?
Interesting that most things are two times cost of back home, but alcohol costs the same.
Made it to maui!
Made it to dallas. Three hour lay over then on to maui!
